track.strDescriptionEN:
"Stay with Me" is a song by British singer-songwriter Sam Smith, released as the third single from his debut studio album In the Lonely Hour (2014). It was released in the United Kingdom as a digital download on 18 May 2014. The song was written by Smith, Jimmy Napes and Tourist. On 25 March 2014, the song was played for the first time on Zane Lowe's BBC Radio 1 show at 7:30pm. On 29 March, he performed the song live on Saturday Night Live in the US. On 16 May, he performed the song on The Graham Norton Show.
A music video to accompany the release of "Stay with Me" was first released onto YouTube on 27 March 2014 at a total length of three minutes and twenty-nine seconds. The video shows Sam coming out of a house and walking down a street in London and sitting in a room performing the song, he is then performing the song in a church with a choir. It was directed by Jamie Thraves.
